page.title: LaunchVisITvisualization
page.introduction: The Launch VisIT-based Visualization Tool launches a separate tool for visualizing geometries and data for spatial simulations using VisIT visualization software.
page.operations: To use this visualization tool, you must have visIT installed on your local computer. VisIT is freely available from Lawrence Livermore National Laboratories at https://wci.llnl.gov/codes/visit/.
